casebody.data:
Noelle Roselyn AIPPERSPACH, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Mahir S. Al-Hakim, Deceased, petitioner,
v.
Patrick McINERNEY, in His Official Capacity as Board President, Kansas City Board of Police Commissioners, et al. No. 14-683. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 23, 2015.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
